rooms.description: Entrance hall with storage and cloakroom.
Open plan living and dining area with modern decor and ample natural light. Features a semi-open kitchen integrated into the space.
Dedicated home office designed for productivity; includes quiet ambiance with a view of the courtyard.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom ensuring privacy and comfort. Vastu alignment placed in the northeast quadrant.
Secondary bedroom designed for children or guests, located near the central courtyard to promote natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom ensuring ample space and privacy. Vastu suggests placement in the west quadrant.
Fourth bedroom for family expansion or guest use. Placed according to local norms with easy access to amenities.
Master bathroom attached to the master bedroom; includes modern fixtures and privacy features.
Common family bathroom located centrally for convenience.
Storage area integrated into the entrance hall for keeping essentials organized.
Central open courtyard providing natural light and ventilation to all adjoining rooms. Includes landscaping design in accordance with Vastu principles.
